title: Alien Vocalizations
description: Alien Vocalizations sound package with 228 high-quality monster sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral vocalizations, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/alien-vocalizations

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/hu65hgfzw8geuez/MSE%20-%20Alien%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


An Alien is a creature of extraterrestrial origin. It resembles a human or humanoid, but only in appearance. This monster's voice is not at all like a human's. It can be squeaky and harsh, like a humanoid, or it can be lower and rougher, like a large mutant.

All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 15 voice actions, including 228 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 24 voice sounds during an attack
  • 12 battle shouts
  • 12 bite and yelp sounds
  • 32 deaths
  • 4 exert and effort sounds
  • 12 groans
  • 32 growls
  • 4 idle and speech sounds
  • 8 sounds of jumping and action
  • 4 laughs
  • 24 pains
  • 32 roars
  • 8 snarling sounds
  • 12 snorting and grunting sounds
  • 8 victory shouts


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs. 


This package is ideal for creating small and medium-sized monster voices: alien, mutant, humanoid, parasite, critter, demon, troglodyte and more. 


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, horror or any other where monsters live and roar.




For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 228 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 15 voice actions
  • 128 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 68 voice samples of the pain type
  • 32 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 228

Number of Audio Cues: 228

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 05 minutes 26 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
